name: Chudo Potion
description:
We decided to make a product where you - the player - will have to take control of an adept of the jam potion school.

 The adept under your control must pass the exam on the preparation of the great decoction

 MoleJam (Krotovuha - translated from ancient Tatar).

 You have to grow all the reagents yourself, and then convert them into 5 potions

 what will become the basis of Krotovuha.


Control
  • WASD - move
  • E -  interact
  • Q - drop
  • F -attack
  • Take the seeds
  • Plant seeds on the beds 
  •  Interact with the beds 
  •  Love the beds
Tatar - Art\Sound Jorik - Programming Remember Adept

Blue seeds - pour water from the fountain

Yellow seeds - to introduce fertilizer from a composer 

Red seeds - to water with the blood of innocent animals

Purple seeds - require all of the above actions. 

And the minimum necessary training from the main menu

This is our project on MFGJ Winter 2023
